rules: Rule1: If a banker works for a bank, then that bank is compliant.
Rule2: Either a banker works for a bank, or a banker manages an account.
Rule3: Under the condition that an investment is reviewed by compliance, the investment is high risk.
Rule4: Either an investment is reviewed by compliance, or it is approved by a director.
Rule5: Whenever an investment is approved by a director, if an employee is sober while working, then the employee is not intoxicated while working.
Rule6: An account is profitable, or the account is growing.
Rule7: If an account is growing, then the bank is compliant.
Rule8: Under the condition that an account is stable, the bank is compliant.
Rule9: If a deposit has insurance, then the deposit is insured by FDIC.
Rule10: If a bank is fined, then the bank has a regulatory violation.
Rule11: An analyst publishes a report, or if an employee is sober while working, then the employee is not intoxicated while working.
Rule12: An analyst has a confidential report, or the analyst does not publish a report.
Rule13: Under the condition that a report has authorized publication, an analyst does not have a confidential report.
Rule14: If a bank completes an audit, then the bank has an internal audit.
Rule15: Whenever a regulator has an ongoing investigation, if the bank has a compliance investigation, then the bank has a regulatory violation.
Rule16: If a bank has criminal charges, then the bank does not have civil charges.
Rule17: A bank has criminal charges, or a regulator has an ongoing investigation.
Rule18: Provided that a bank has regulatory oversight, if the bank has criminal charges, then the bank has civil charges.
Rule19: A bank has a regular examination, or the bank has a special examination.
Rule20: If a bank has a special examination, then the bank has regulatory oversight.
Rule21: Provided that a loan is approved, the transaction is not fraudulent.
Rule22: Whenever a loan is rejected, the transaction is not fraudulent.
Rule23: If an application is submitted, then the loan is approved.
Rule24: Under the condition that an application is withdrawn, the loan is rejected.
Rule25: If an application has documentation, then either the application is submitted or the application is withdrawn.
Rule26: Provided that it is not the case that if the deposit is insured by FDIC, then if the account is profitable, the account is stable, then the bank is fined.
Rule27: Whenever it is not the case that if the deposit is insured by FDIC, then if the account is profitable, the account is stable, then the bank completes an audit.
Rule28: If it is not the case that if the deposit is insured by FDIC, then if the account is profitable, the account is stable, then the bank has a compliance investigation.
Rule29: Provided that it is not the case that if the deposit is insured by FDIC, then if the account is profitable, the account is stable, then it is not the case that the bank has an internal audit.
Rule30: If it is not the case that if a banker manages an account, then the bank is compliant, then the transaction is fraudulent.
Rule31: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the bank has a regular examination, then the bank has regulatory oversight, then the bank's license is revoked.
Rule32: Whenever it is not the case that if the bank has a regular examination, then the bank has regulatory oversight, then it is not the case that the bank's license is revoked.
Rule33: If the bank is not compliant, then an employee is sober while working.
Rule34: Provided that the bank is not compliant, an employee is intoxicated while working.
facts: Fact2: A report has authorized publication.
Fact4: It is not the case that an investment is high risk.
Fact5: The bank does not have a regulatory violation.
